snippet.title: Dead of Darkness - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a good look at upcoming 2D survival horror game, Dead of Darkness in this new trailer. Inspired by the original Resident Evil, Dead of Darkness is teeming with puzzles and features a heavy emphasis on dark, thematic storytelling.
Set in England in 1985, players step into the boots of private investigator Miles Windham, who, following the tragic passing of his daughter, heads to the mysterious Velvet Island to investigate a lead on her death.
Dead of Darkness release date trailer reveals that the game is coming to PC (Steam) on January 23, 2025. The Dead of Darkness demo is available to play now.

#DeadOfDarkness #Gaming #IGN
